verses.verse: (PSALM 43) (Prayer for Help.) Vindicate me, God, and plead my case against an ungodly nation; (Or May You) Save me from the deceitful and unjust person!
For You are the God of my strength; why have You rejected me? Why do I go about mourning (Or while the enemy oppresses) because of the oppression of the enemy?
Send out Your light and Your truth, they shall lead me; They shall bring me to Your holy hill And to Your dwelling places.
Then I will go to the altar of God, To God (Lit the gladness of my joy) my exceeding joy; And I will praise You on the lyre, God, my God.

Why are you (Or dissolved away) in despair, my soul? And why are you restless within me? Wait for God, for I will (Or still) again praise (As in some ancient mss; MT Him, the help of my face and my God) Him For the (Or saving acts of) help of His presence, my God.
